channel.title: Keep Crashing at "Office" (3rd chapiter)
channel.description: Hello there, I don't know if it's the good spot to report a bug, but that's where I can. First I want say that I started the game 3 days ago and you made a wonderful work for this game. I am at the begining of the chapiter (Office) and I went left througt the water, then left to get the Security Guard and his supplies... Then I went to the flooded room, then the ventilation, then I fall, and when I open the door (with "E") to get the guard back, the game instantly crashs each times I do that. Here are the sreenshot before it happen and the dumps files. [img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Attachment/4410/?thumbnail=1[/img] My config : Laptop ; Windows 7 64bits ; Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2670QM CPU @ 2.20GHz ; RAM 6,00 GB ; Regards. ![2016-01-05_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://yyQvXQvnaOt06ZMwjTLtmId0O6b.jpeg) crash_bms.exe_20160105162953_1.txt (356 KB) crash_bms.exe_20160105170240_1.txt (355 KB)

item.title: Keep Crashing at "Office" (3rd chapiter)
item.dc:creator: biggle0683FR
item.description:
Hello there, I don’t know if it’s the good spot to report a bug, but that’s where I can.

First I want say that I started the game 3 days ago and you made a wonderful work for this game.

I am at the begining of the chapiter (Office) and I went left througt the water, then left to get the Security Guard and his supplies…
Then I went to the flooded room, then the ventilation, then I fall, and when I open the door (with “E”) to get the guard back, the game instantly crashs each times I do that.

Here are the sreenshot before it happen and the dumps files.

My config : Laptop ; Windows 7 64bits ; Intel® Core™ i7-2670QM CPU @ 2.20GHz ; RAM 6,00 GB ;

Regards.

2016-01-05_00002.jpg1360×768 121 KB

crash_bms.exe_20160105162953_1.txt (356 KB)
crash_bms.exe_20160105170240_1.txt (355 KB)
